page.title: 10LITTLE MARCLE RELIGION (1)
page.content: {Little Marcle. St. Michael & All {Angels Anglican Church The church was rebuilt on this site in 1870. Two previous sites were at Prior's Acre & Little Marcle Court where part of a wall & some tombstones are still standing. The church plate dates from l57l & the list of rectors goes back to the l2th century. The reredos and two-manual organ were given by Lady Henry Somerset. Little Marcle parish has recently been combined with St. Michael's Ledbury and the Rector of Ledbury will shortly be inducted as Priest-in-Charge.
